attributes.action: Place a St.George flag on every School,Church,University and Hospital in England to encourage patriotism through the English community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England has gone through such a dramatic change over the past 12 years, its unrecognizable to our native English people, placing an English flag on these buildings would be the first step in restoring public patriotism & faith in this once beautiful country.
